fi.karilaalo.trin.reqTokenAuth

Class ReqAuthConfiguration

  • java.lang.Object
    • fi.karilaalo.trin.reqTokenAuth.ReqAuthConfiguration

  • @Configuration
public class ReqAuthConfiguration
extends Object
    Configuration class to make application.properties available for the application.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static String LIST_SEPARATOR
      List separator is used in application.properties to separate values to generate lists.
      static String ROLE_SUPER
      Final field for superAdmin role.
      static String ROLE_USER
      Basic user role.

    • Field Detail

      • ROLE_SUPER

        public static final String ROLE_SUPER
        Final field for superAdmin role. SuperAdmin is able to see all information provided by the application.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • ROLE_USER

        public static final String ROLE_USER
        Basic user role.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • LIST_SEPARATOR

        public static final String LIST_SEPARATOR
        List separator is used in application.properties to separate values to generate lists.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

    • Constructor Detail

      • ReqAuthConfiguration

        public ReqAuthConfiguration(@Value(value="${my.reqAuth.detInclList}")
                            String detInclList,
                            @Value(value="${my.reqAuth.superList}")
                            String superList,
                            @Value(value="${my.reqAuth.hideList}")
                            String hideList)
        Parameters:
        detInclList - A list of details that will be used in user's authentication object. See my.reqAuth.detInclList in application.properties.
        superList - List of user ids that will be granted the superAdmin role. Will be generated from my.reqAuth.superList in application properties by the constructor.
        hideList - List of authentication headers that will be hidden from the user. However, the current info.html template shows headers only for superAdmins.

    • Method Detail

      • getReqAuthFilter

        @Bean
public ReqAuthFilter getReqAuthFilter()
        Factory method to initialize the authentication processing filter.
        Returns:
        ReqAuthFilter that is configured to use in UserInfoSecConfigurer.

      • getAuthHdr

        public String getAuthHdr()
        Returns:
        Authentication header name from which value the user identity is created. Will be saved as authentication principal.

      • getDetHdrPrefix

        public String getDetHdrPrefix()
        Returns:
        Header prefix that is used to fetch authentication details for a user.

      • getDetInclList

        public List<String> getDetInclList()
        Returns:
        A list of details that will be used in user's authentication object. See my.reqAuth.detInclList in application.properties.

      • isSuperAdmin

        public boolean isSuperAdmin(String id)
        Parameters:
        id - Query by user id if user is in the list of superAdmins.
        Returns:
        Whether the queried user has a superAdmin role.

      • getSuperRole

        public org.springframework.security.core.GrantedAuthority getSuperRole()
        Returns:
        The role for superAdmin.

      • getUserRole

        public org.springframework.security.core.GrantedAuthority getUserRole()
        Returns:
        The role for basic user.

      • matchesToHideList

        public boolean matchesToHideList(String str)
        Parameters:
        str - String to test whether header should be hidden from view.
        Returns:
        Boolean value indicating whether the header should be hidden from the view.
